title: Open Assistant – project meant to give everyone access to a great chat based LLM
dot:
digraph OpenAssistant{graph[rankdir=LR, fontsize=10, fontname="Arial"];node[shape=rect, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#e0f7fa", fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial", color="#00796b"];OpenAssistant[label="Open Assistant

2. Train reward model

• Goal: >50k samples"];Step2[label="Step 2: Rank Responses

title: Ask HN: Are you tired of reading ChatGPT headlines?
